Hello, I'm **Yefrosynii Kolenko**, a Software Engineer at [@piar-ee](https://github.com/yefrosynii-piar) based in Estonia üá™üá™. 

I love building systems that scale. I enjoy designing fast, reliable and secure architectures ‚Äî from caching layers to real-time systems and efficient databases. *Always learning*, *always shipping* üöÄ
